author: Krassimir Kossev
releaseNotes:
2.2.4 2021-12-05 - added support for 'YSR-MINI-Z Remote TS004F'
2.3.0 2022-02-13 - added support for 'Tuya Smart Knob TS004F'
2.4.0 2022-03-31 - added support for 'MOES remote TS0044', singleThreaded: true; bug fix: debouncing timer was not started for TS0044 remote
2.4.1 2022-04-23 - improved tracing of debounce logic code; option [overwrite: true] is set explicitely on debouncing timer restart; debounce timer increased to 1000ms
